error.message: Call to deprecated function drupal_get_installed_schema_version(). Deprecated in drupal:9.3.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\Update\UpdateHookRegistry::getInstalledVersion() or \Drupal\Core\Update\UpdateHookRegistry::getAllInstalledVersions() instead.
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
